name: Mouja
overview: Mouja is the Playstation of the game Mouja that is a conversion of an arcade machine that was originaly released as a game for MS-Windows 95, developed by Fujitsu Personal Systems in 1995. The game was also ported to the Sega Saturn console. The gameplay is a cross between "Money Puzzle Exchanger" and "Puyo Puyo". The player needs to make up a certain value from the falling coins by joining them together just like in any other action puzzle game. Once that value is reached then the coins will vanish. COINS VALUE: 2 coins of 500: Dissapear 5 coins of 100 = 1 coin of 500 5 coins of 1= 1 yellow coin 2 yellow coins = 1 coin of 10 5 coins of 10 = 1 coin of 50 2 coins of 50 = 1 coin of 100 GAME MODES: - Story mode - Vs computer mode - Vs other player mode
